mapper.select: SELECT FOOD_ID AS foodId, FOOD_NAME AS foodName, CATEGORY AS category, CALORIES_KCAL AS caloriesKcal, CARBS_G AS carbsG, PROTEIN_G AS proteinG, FAT_G AS fatG, SUGAR_G AS sugarG, FIBER_G AS fiberG, CALCIUM_MG AS calciumMg, SODIUM_MG AS sodiumMg FROM FOOD_NUTRITION WHERE LOWER(FOOD_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY FOOD_NAME
SELECT FOOD_NAME FROM FOOD_NUTRITION WHERE LOWER(FOOD_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY FOOD_NAME FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
